description:
( Note : Still adding more videos)

You are here reading this because you are a complete beginner in HTML. And CSS . If not, please close this page right now. You want to learn about HTML to become a Web Designer or a Web Developer.

Just to get this out of the way. You will learn a lot about HTML in this course. But it will not be enough to enable you to create the awesomest web pages yet. Every learning is a process. And if you are not patient. Believe me you will never be as good as you want to be.

You must start from the bottom. “Started from the bottom now we’re here” .Yeah it’s all true.  It all takes time.

Be patient. Learn to be good.  Don’t learn so that you can create things haphazardly . Of course that is the ultimate dream. To be able to create anything with HTML and CSS. It is more important to learn to be a problem solver. If a problem is set before you, you need to be able to come up with a solution that will still be feasible years down the line.

Whatever your reason for learning HTML may be, start here. And grow your skills.

 

I have to be frank and admit that it is more about me in creating this HTML (and  just a brush of CSS) course. The reason I say that, is because, my ultimate goal is Javascript. And I want to be sure that 6months or 2 years from now when I will be intensely doing JavaScript tutorials I will have these HTML courses to refer you back to.

And yes , I will be creating a couple more advanced HTML and CSS courses before I fully dive into Javascript . So start here and take this journey with me.  I am currently working on a new Website . I haven’t mentioned this anywhere else. And I will not mention it anywhere else until the time is right. I am working on a website, where I will be teaching JS related tutorials. I will do this in a bid to master the language , myself.

Join this HTML tutorial and take this journey with me.

 

Ricky Wahowa ( Bizanosa )
title: What is HTML?  and a bit about CSS
